ygData.subject: Re: Sharpening ... Stone
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I can sharpen a stone, but is there polish to be found anywhere? I have heard of polish from P4 and I have explored most of Faydwer looking for polish
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I can sharpen a stone, but is there polish to be found anywhere?
I have heard of polish from P4 and I have explored most of Faydwer
looking for polish but have not been able to find any anywhere.
Has anyone found polish and have been able to use it?


> If you want the answer here, you have to buy
> sharpening stones (not
> sold everywhere) at 3 or 4cp a piece and then put
> the rusty weapon
> and a sharpening stone in a forge (available
> somewhere in most
> cities, ask around) and then hit combine. If you're
> lucky you'll get
> a taarnished weapon which will be a couple delay
> points faster! Not
> bad. You might however fail and then loose both the
> wepon and the
> stone (lost anyway).
